revised_title: Hindoo Division of the Octave and Higher Order Music Theory
tldr: This article discusses the Hindoo division of the octave and its implications for music theory, particularly in the context of higher order systems. The author extends previous methods to explore these systems further and introduces a classification of systems based on their formation of thirds. Additionally, the article delves into the transformation of generalized keyboards and provides a rule for arranging key-boards of higher orders.
